This site was developed for an [Rfun](https://rfun.library.duke.edu) workshop entitled *Quarto: a first look*

[John Little](https://johnlittle.info) is the host of Rfun, a site devoted to learning R and the Tidyverse.

## Data sets

The data sets in this example Quarto publication are as follows:

| Title                     | Information                                                                  | Filename                                       |
|---------------------------------|---------------------|------------------|
| Qualtrics survey data     | Auto-generated test data generated at Qualtrics compiled using a test survey | `qualtrics_student_satisfaction-test-data.csv` |
| Monthly Retail trade data | https://www.census.gov/retail/index.html                                     | `data.csv`                                     |

[More information](https://github.com/libjohn/quarto_what_is_it/data/README.md)
